ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1940)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1944)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (COMP:1953, COMP:1954, COMP:1955), such that
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP (has component)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Treatment Given Substance Administration (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.55)
